articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Mark Meadows: Trump aide fails to have Georgia case moved
articles.description: The ruling against Mark Meadows means the case by Fulton County prosecutors survived its first test.
articles.content: A US judge has denied a request from Mark Meadows, a Trump aide charged in the Georgia election meddling probe, to move his case to a federal court.
